channel.title: The Wrestling Dungeon
channel.description: An audio podcast covering all the stars of WWE professional wrestling, such as John Cena, The undertaker, Randy Orton, Ric Flair, Jeff Hardy, The Rock and "Stone Cold" Steve Austin. Hosted by former wrestler Adam Joyce and British announcer Stevie Aaron.
channel.itunes:author: Adam Joyce
channel.itunes:subtitle: An audio podcast covering WWE professional wrestling. Hosted by former wrestler Adam Joyce and British announcer Stevie Aaron.
channel.itunes:summary: An audio podcast covering all the stars of WWE and TNA professional wrestling, such as John Cena, The Undertaker, Triple H, Randy Orton, Ric Flair, Jeff Hardy, Hulk Hogan, CM Punk, Bret Hart, The Rock and "Stone Cold" Steve Austin. Hosted by former wrestler Adam Joyce and British announcer Stevie Aaron.

item.title: The Wrestling Dungeon: Wrestlemania 26 review
item.itunes:author: Blake Norton
item.itunes:subtitle: Blake Norton and Adam Joyce chair a roundtable review of Wrestlemania 26.
item.itunes:summary: Join Blake, Adam, special guest MISS GALATEA and The Wrestling Dungeon All-Stars for a roundtable review of wrestling's biggest show of the year. Shawn Michaels vs. The Undertaker II, Bret Hart's return, John Cena's comeback and more are all discussed and rated in detail by wrestling's insiders on what's set to be the final edition of The Wrestling Dungeon.
item.description: Join Blake, Adam, special guest MISS GALATEA and The Wrestling Dungeon All-Stars for a roundtable review of wrestling's biggest show of the year. Shawn Michaels vs. The Undertaker II, Bret Hart's return, John Cena's comeback and more are all discussed and rated in detail by wrestling's insiders on what's set to be the final edition of The Wrestling Dungeon.

item.title: The Wrestling Dungeon: Wrestlemania 26 & The Future of WWE
item.itunes:author: Blake Norton
item.itunes:subtitle: Blake Norton and The Wrestling Dungeon team rate the of WWE's top stars and future headliners, the state of TNA, and deliver the an insider preview of Wrestlemania, including what to expect, who's favourite to win and why.
item.itunes:summary: Blake Norton returns with Adam Joyce, Stevie Aaron and Darren Holmes for the hardest-hitting episode we've ever done. We to discuss the state of pro wrestling, the future of WWE's top stars and future headliners, the state of TNA, and deliver the an insider preview of Wrestlemania, including what to expect, who's favourite to win and why.
item.description: Blake Norton returns with Adam Joyce, Stevie Aaron and Darren Holmes for the hardest-hitting episode we've ever done. item.itunes:summary: A Hart thumping edition this week as Adam and Stevie discuss the fallout from the Rumble and the Bret Hart / Vince McMahon confrontation! Who will Edge face at Mania? item.title: The Wrestling Dungeon - Royal Rumble Preview

item.itunes:summary: It's a two-hour BUMPER SHOW as Blake & Adam preview the 2010 Royal Rumble - a Pay-Per-View WWE actually WANTS us to buy! Who will win? Who SHOULD win? Shawn Michaels? John Cena? item.title: The Wrestling Dungeon - Hulk Hogan Screws Jeff Jarrett
item.itunes:author: Blake Norton
item.itunes:subtitle: Hulk Hogan screws Jeff Jarrett! TNA Genesis reviewed, plus Raw with Shawn Michaels, Triple-H, John Cena and Big Show pushing us towards Rumble, Rey vs. Batista headline Smackdown in a steel cage and more!
item.itunes:summary: Hulk Hogan screws Jeff Jarrett! TNA Genesis reviewed, plus Raw with Shawn Michaels, Triple-H, John Cena and Big Show pushing us towards Rumble, Rey vs. Batista headline Smackdown in a steel cage and more!
item.description: The bloom is off the rose as Hulk Hogan has deftly turned TNA’s slow decline into a TAILSPIN OF DOOM. Find out how in our review of Genesis! From there we run down Raw with Shawn Michaels, Triple-H, John Cena and Big Show pushing us towards Rumble, Rey vs. Batista headline Smackdown in a steel cage and more, all on this week’s Wrestling Dungeon!

item.title: The Wrestling Dungeon - The Miz is AWESOME!
item.itunes:author: Blake Norton
item.itunes:subtitle: Rey vs. Batista part 17, The Harts vs. Cryme Tyme part 94, and MIKE TYSON makes his pro-wrestling debut! PLUS, we're joined by the UK's premiere ring announcer Stevie Aaron, and have we said.... that THE MIZ IS AWESOME?
item.itunes:summary: Rey vs. Batista part 17, The Harts vs. Cryme Tyme part 94, and MIKE TYSON makes his pro-wrestling debut! PLUS, we're joined by the UK's premiere ring announcer Stevie Aaron, and have we said.... that THE MIZ IS AWESOME?
item.description: With January 4th now a distant memory, it's back to Rey vs. Batista part 17, The Harts vs. Cryme Tyme part 94, and MIKE TYSON makes his pro-wrestling debut! It... would have meant more in 1998. PLUS, we're joined by the UK's premiere ring announcer Stevie Aaron to discuss the wrestling biz in 2010, and have we said.... that THE MIZ IS AWESOME?

item.title: The Wrestling Dungeon - WWE vs. TNA
item.itunes:author: Blake Norton
item.itunes:subtitle: It's WWE vs. TNA as Ric Flair, Jeff Hardy, Bret Hart and Hulk Hogan return to wrestling for the biggest night in ten years!
item.itunes:summary: It's WWE vs. TNA as Ric Flair, Jeff Hardy, Bret Hart and Hulk Hogan return to wrestling for the biggest night in ten years!
item.description: It's the biggest Wrestling Dungeon ever as we break down the Jan 4th WWE vs. TNA Monday Night War! Who won? Who lost? Who were the casualties? The return of Ric Flair, Jeff Hardy, Bret Hart, Hulk Hogan, The Nasty... Boys... and SO much more. Get the whole scoop from wrestling's insiders at The Wrestling Dungeon!

item.title: The Wrestling Dungeon - WWE Is Dope
item.itunes:author: Blake Norton
item.itunes:subtitle: A preview of the WWE vs. TNA January 4th battle, a review of the wacky week in wrestling, Triple-H buries more talent & Timbaland is totally dope!
item.itunes:summary: A preview of the WWE vs. TNA January 4th battle, a review of the wacky week in wrestling, Triple-H buries more talent & Timbaland is totally dope!
item.description: The Wrestling Dungeon caps off the year with a two-hour show previewing the January 4th WWE vs. TNA battle. From there we discuss Wrestlemania 26 plans, review the week in wrestling, and explain why WWE PPV numbers are PLUMMETING. Plus, Triple-H buries yet more upcoming talent and more! Like Timbaland, we're totally dope!

item.itunes:summary: DX go to court, Batista & Rey Mysterio tear it up, Adam Joyce on Ring Of Honor: Final Battle and more on the Christmas edition of The Wrestling Dungeon!
item.description: Raw's streak of failures continue as DX attends "Midget Court," while Batista, Rey Mysterio, The Harts and John Morrison BRING IT on Smackdown. Plus, Adam reviews Ring Of Honor's first internet pay-per-view, "Final Battle," Darren's got the week in wrestling and more in the Christmas edition of The Wrestling Dungeon!

item.title: The Wrestling Dungeon - Umaga
item.itunes:author: Blake Norton
item.itunes:subtitle: Umaga dies at the age of 36 while Blake & Adam preview this Sunday's WWE TLC Pay-Per-View; a show which glorifies the style of wrestling which may have caused it.
item.itunes:summary: Umaga dies at the age of 36 while Blake & Adam preview this Sunday's WWE TLC Pay-Per-View; a show which glorifies the style of wrestling which may have caused it.
item.description: A giant show this week. Blake & Adam discuss becoming numb to yet another wrestling tragedy. We have a full review of a very newsworthy Raw and Smackdown, and an insider preview of TLC, a show whose very premise seems to mock the deaths of WWE's performers. Blake explains why WWE needs to put the belt on Sheamus, Darren Holmes has the week's results from WWE, TNA & Ring Of Honor, and much more.

item.itunes:summary: Kofi Kingston continues his climb to the top, while The Miz, Jack Swagger and Evan Bourne continue to be overlooked. Thank God for Sheamus; WWE's 280lb headlight reflector may not be a great wrestler, but boy is he BIG!

item.itunes:author: Blake Norton
item.itunes:subtitle: The Wrestling Dungeon presents a special six-man roundtable review of WWE Survivor Series! Undertaker reaps souls, DX seeks gold, Sheamus knocks the ref out cold and much more!
item.itunes:summary: Blake & Adam are joined by The Wrestling Dungeon All Stars for their first ever SIX MAN pay-per-view roundtable! DX implodes, Sheamus gets the big push, Kofi represents Jamacia with pride (for some reason) and Christian is the odd man out! The Wrestling Dungeon's Survivor Series special rocks the body that rocks the party!

item.title: The Wrestling Dungeon - Boom Boom BOOM~!
item.itunes:author: Blake Norton
item.itunes:subtitle: Is The Undertaker dead? Are DX heels? Kofi breaks out, Miz is AWESOME, a full Survivor Series preview and more on the November 18th Wrestling Dungeon!
item.itunes:summary: Is The Undertaker dead? Are DX heels? Kofi breaks out, Miz is AWESOME, a full Survivor Series preview and more on the November 18th Wrestling Dungeon!
item.description: The Wrestling Dungeon returns with a nearly two-hour show covering the whole week in wrestling and giving an insider preview of Sunday's Survivor Series! Who will win? Who will lose? If an Irishman falls in the woods, does it make a sound? And can The Undertaker claim social security if he's technically dead? All these important questions and more on this week's Wrestling Dungeon with Blake Norton and Adam Joyce!

item.title: The Wrestling Dungeon - Pep Talk
item.itunes:author: Blake Norton
item.itunes:subtitle: Shawn Michaels is going senile, Undertaker is off his meds, and Hunter is chasing a midget. Thank goodness Dixie Carter is here to give us a pep talk!
item.itunes:summary:
Shawn Michaels is going senile, Undertaker is off his meds, and Hunter is chasing a midget. Thank goodness Dixie Carter is here to give us a pep talk!
Get an insider perspective on this week's Wrestling Dungeon!
item.description:
Wrestling SUCKS this week. It's fake, and dumb, and stupid, and makes no sense. Shawn Michaels is going senile, Undertaker is off his meds again, and Triple-H is more concerned about a handicapped fan wearing his merchandise than winning the world title. Thank goodness Dixie Carter is here to give us a pep talk! All this plus READER MAIL!
Get an insider perspective on this week's Wrestling Dungeon!

item.itunes:subtitle: What’s next for Batista after jumping to Smackdown? Has Randy Orton been whipped? And does Undertaker have a limo driver’s license?
item.itunes:summary: What’s next for Batista after jumping to Smackdown? Has Randy Orton been whipped? And does Undertaker have a limo driver’s license? All will be revealed in the September 22nd edition of The Wrestling Dungeon!

item.title: The Wrestling Dungeon - WWE Breaking Point
item.itunes:author: Blake Norton
item.itunes:subtitle: CM Punk commits hit and run on The Undertaker? Jeff Hardy a drug dealer? John Cena auditioning for S&M Porn? It’s manslaughter in Montreal bringing us to our breaking point!

item.title: The Wrestling Dungeon - Hart Attack
item.itunes:author: Blake Norton
item.itunes:subtitle: Who wants it Raw when Smackdown is so well done?
